Title: Te3n
Writer: Bijesh Jayarajan (screenplay), Geun-seop Jeong (story by: based on Korean film "Montage"), Suresh Nair (screenplay), Ritesh Shah (dialogue)
Actors: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Amitabh Bachchan, Vidya Balan, Mukesh Chhabra
Plot: A grandfather, a priest, and a police officer investigate the case of a kidnapped child.
